name: Mist Attunement 2
description:
Become one with the Mists and gain the following:
• The "Fractal Prodigy" title
• 5 agony resistance, 1% increased outgoing damage, and 15 health per second in fractals for every character in your account
• 1 additional fractal encryption and bag of fractal relics from the final chest in every fractal
Level 2 of 4—Effects stack with previous level.

description: Used to open buried locked chests in Dry Top. These chests are only visible during sandstorms. Chests can contain armor, weapons, rare skins, recipes, ambrite, and more.

Dyes can be unlocked for unlimited use to color armor on all characters. Dye bottles can also be recycled in the Mystic Forge.

buff.description:

(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)
